name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by cryztal, mikeronomicon, Thorfinn, tttt, atticusonline, michellemarie, bob_lamonta, chatterjee, jugglinfreak, littlefatdog, SenseiHollywood, Pigs)

name: pogo
text: This one, prick?

name: i_love_kate
text: Interesting. The unseen upshot of raising my Lame comment-viewing threshold to 8 is that I can now see the comments of yours that are entirely innocuous.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Not any more.

name: zem
text: mine's at 200 until i see a comment that it actually screens

name: katal
text: Ray, Beef, Teodor, Lyle, Pat... I dig how this storyline features so many of the characters.

name: wehavemagnums
text: I think Lyle should kick Pat's ass for that.

name: saint
text: shank 'em if ya got 'em, boys.

name: petitegitan
text: Pat - don't be hatin'.  You wanted to play, and T asked for a note!

name: direhaggis
text: Ray needs pepto, Pat needs horse tranquilizers.

name: tellumo
text: Pat's "ahem"ing at the beginning is a nice little manifestation of his dickery. Also note how Beef is cringing in the eighth panel (second one in the second row).

name: phy
text: Beef hates prog banjo music so freakin' much.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Beef has endured much abuse in his time, but it still causes pain.

name: judahnielsen
text: Paul Prudhomme sex tape is guaranteed to give me nightmares, but Lyle assumes everyone will want to gather around it.

name: apocowarg
text:
Yikes.

[IMGS OFF]

name: scorpio_nadir
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: genequagmire
text: The mere idea gives me conniptions.

name: vorrishnikov
text: The star of this strip is "Paul Prudhomme sex tape."

name: zeal
text: If Lyle were in a non-Nice Pete band, this is what it would be called.

name: i_love_kate
text: Not just that, but "bootleg". Unless that's how you say pirated version in America, that means a mock-up with lookalikes and a poor video quality.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: That's how you say pirated version in America. Because that's what it means. Arrrgghh.

name: i_love_kate
text: ...Oh yeah.

name: i_love_kate
text: Alternatively, check out who's the dick about terms.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Bootlegging is a rich tradition in America. Terms have been therefore created to describe situations

name: caduceo
text:
If I am ever in a band (I won't be) I would say that when asked to play a chord. "no dude play an E there man"

"this one, prick?!

name: steerpike66
text: 'AAAIIIGHT!' is starting to really grow on me as something to insert into diabolical musical rants.

name: deancain29
text: this one, prick = classic Pat

name: cdl146
text: Beef's absolutely pained expression in the eighth panel says it all.

name: zedpower
text: The fact that he doesn't leave, that he just sits there and endures, tells a lot about his character.

name: le_chien_manquee
text: jesus.  pat really is an absolute dick.

name: farqussus
text: The unnecessarily ferocious prick makes my teeth clench in anger, but I love it.

name: heavymetaljesus
text: Man, I say "aight" all the time, now I feel hella evil.

name: dougthehead
text: Lyle's line is awesome:  "Hint:  Me.  It was me.  Living room, now."

name: heccibiggs
text:
Upon re-reading this strip, I realised that I completely stole Lyle's dialogue from the eleventh panel when writing in my blog about getting a place at uni.

And there was me thinking I was original and funny. Bummer.

name: ibetso
text: 5 for "this one, prick ". Typical unbridled dickery from Pat.

name: sargasm
text: I never noticed this until now, but everyone plays the banjo in a different way.  Teodor's was kind of regular and playful, Beef's was in a monotone, and now Pat is playing the banjo like an asshole.  You can tell.

name: agentj
text: There is more going on in this strip than has happened to me in most weeks.

name: soticoto
text: The elite combination of panels 9 and 10 truly make this strip.

name: bob_lamonta
text:
the face that roast beef pulls in panel 8 is exactly the face i always wanna pull whenever someone tries to "impress" me/someone else with the guitar.

and i guess it's the face everyone else wants to pull when i try to "impress" them with the guitar.

name: deovalente
text: I read "Lyle!  You adorable IDIOT!"

name: xiaomimi
text:
Weekend Blogs

Molly: Picnic a la Boeuf

name: diggidy
text: "Man, Lyle, that ain't no Paul Prudhomme!  This is just a grainy copy of the Dom DeLuise sex tape.  And here I was getting all excited."

name: baryonyx
text:
My god. I had completely forgotten this arc.

It's beautiful .

name: mr_lostman28
text:
Notice how Doc Andretti assumes Ray will take the meds he prescribes because Ray scream "AAAIGHT!" right after he presecribes them.

Doc: *hangs up phone* Well it seems I finally got him to do something I asked mother.

name: ham_shoes
text: Lyle doesn't have time to wait for people's guessing.

name: dj_douche
text: Hint: Me. It was me.

name: king-jim
text: Looks like pat removed his hideous shoes for his banjo performance.

name: tonyhighwind
text: I thought those were socks.

name: mercuri0us
text: Panel 12: how is the banjo suspended in mid-air with no strap and no hands???

name: hendetta
text: Pat is playing Pete Yorn.
